overview: Glenn Rogers is the CEO of StreetFire, which he joined in 2008. Prior to Streetfire Glenn had extensive experience in digital media, consumer and trade magazines as well as daily and weekly newspaper industry with the last sixteen years in various senior management positions. Recent experience includes supervision of a large number of trade shows and exhibitions. Experienced in every aspect of publishing from press operation to senior level corporation management. Before joining Streetfire Glenn was COO of Black Press, a privately held media company with over 4,000 employees and properties in Canada and the US. Prior to Black Press Glenn was EVP of Cahners, now Reed Business, and his portfolio there included Daily Variety, Publisherâ€™s Weekly and others.
